sentences.en: A flight of green parrots shot out of the cedar forest.
sentences.cn: 一群绿鹦鹉从杉木林里疾速飞出。

sentences.en: a room decorated in pale blues and greens
sentences.cn: 用浅蓝色和浅绿色装修的房间

sentences.en: Blue and green eyeshadow has long been considered kitsch.
sentences.cn: 蓝色和绿色的眼影一直被认为是俗气的。

sentences.en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentences.en: Green and yellow lights blinked on the surface of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 海港的水面上闪烁着绿色和黄色的灯光。

sentences.en: Green recounts how he once went to see Bremner in his lair.
sentences.cn: 格林讲述他有一次去布雷姆纳隐居之处看他的经历。

sentences.en: I was rigged out in my usual green suit.
sentences.cn: 我穿着平时那套绿色套装。

sentences.en: I was wearing two sweaters under the green army jacket.
sentences.cn: 我在绿军装里套了两件毛线衫。

sentences.en: In the background, dressed in pale green, stood Eunice.
sentences.cn: 尤妮斯穿着浅绿色的衣服站在后面不起眼的地方。

sentences.en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentences.cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

sentences.en: Not content with rescuing one theatre, Sally Green has taken on another.
sentences.cn: 萨莉·格林不满足于挽救一家剧院，她又接手了另外一家。

sentences.en: Raw coffee beans are green in colour.
Revenues from "green taxes" could then be channelled back into energy efficiency.
sentences.cn: 从“绿色税收”得来的收入便可回过头来用于提高能效。

sentences.en: She is wearing tight, black leggings and a baggy green jersey.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色紧身裤和一件宽松的绿色针织套衫。

sentences.en: The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
sentences.cn: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

sentences.en: The room remains simple with bare, stippled green walls.
sentences.cn: 房间仍然很简朴，四面都是饰有圆点的绿色空墙。

sentences.en: You don't need green fingers to fill your home with lush leaves.
sentences.cn: 不是园艺大师也可以把自己的家里装点得绿意盎然。

phrases.phrase: green around the gills 或 green about the gills

phrases.tran_cn: （美）绿卡（指允许外国人进入美国工作的绿色许可证）；（英）绿色保险证
温室，花房；陶瓷生坯存放室

trans.tran_cn: 绿色的，未熟的，青春的，未成熟的，主张保护环境的
trans.tran_en: having the colour of grass or leaves

trans.tran_cn: 绿色蔬菜，绿色的衣服，植物
trans.tran_en: the colour of grass and leaves
having the colour of grass or leaves
to fill an area with growing plants in order to make it more attractive

trans.tran_cn: 绿化，使重视环境保护问题
